thread.title: Alfonso A castro
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Alfonso A castro

author: Alfonso A castro
title: Alfonso A castro
text:
B&H was there answering my calls with stupid questions guiding me with tons of options to fit my style and budget. Amazing interactive website full of videos, reviews , accessories and similar products not to mention the lowest prices on this planet.
Very happy customer.
